We are using Atlassian suds fork

The reason to use this fork is because this fork is still being update, while the official project is no longer maintained since mid 2010.

This suds is available at: https://bitbucket.org/jurko/suds
Download page at: https://bitbucket.org/jurko/suds/downloads
Official documentation available at: https://fedorahosted.org/suds/
